name: fishbowl-app
description: A PWA multi-player/multi-device Fishbowl game with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:backend && npm run format:check:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: if exist frontend\build rmdir /s /q frontend\build && if exist frontend\node_modules rmdir /s /q frontend\node_modules
scripts.clean:backend: npm run clean --prefix backend && if exist backend\node_modules rmdir /s /q backend\node_modules
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test
